text: Vi disregard those pren their religi en vain as est social funkci totally sorb en this worldly life. Remind this (Quran) lest anim sufer consequences its evil earnings Gxi hav neniom DI Lord kaj Mastr nor intercessor! Gxi ofert any kind da ransom gxi ne akcept! Ili sufer consequences evil works ili earn ili incurred hellish drink painful retribution their disbelief
